16.title: Full Grown Pizza

18.title: High Dive
18.plot: More Director Shorts: Pizza Steve and Mr. Gus need a fluorescent light bulb but Uncle Grandpa has a better idea. Then, Uncle Grandpa Man must defeat his nemesis. Next, what is it like to wake up everyday as Uncle Grandpa? Finally, Uncle Grandpa takes in a cat. / High Dive: Uncle Grandpa helps Samir overcome his paralyzing fear of the high dive.

20.title: Tiny Miracle's Tiny Miracle
20.plot: Chess Master Steve: Pizza Steve goes to great lengths in order to beat Mr. Gus at a game of chess. / Tiny Miracle's Tiny Miracle: Upon seeing the gang have a fun time swimming and eating ice cream, Tiny Miracle realizes he wants to be a real boy.

22.title: Uncle Grandpa: The High School Years
22.plot: Uncle Grandpa and friends go way back to when they were in high school together.

23.title: Exquisite Grandpa
23.plot: Uncle Greedpa: Uncle Grandpa is in need of some extra cash, so he starts charging for his services. / Exquisite Grandpa: Uncle Grandpa has been having some truly bizarre night terrors.

0.title: Pilot
0.plot: Uncle Grandpa, the uncle and grandfather of everyone in the world, stops by children's houses every day to see how they are doing.

1.title: Belly Bros
1.plot: What's it like going fishing with Uncle Grandpa? Find out in this sneak peek.

2.title: Tiger Trails
2.plot: In the final moments of helping a kid, Uncle Grandpa just needs his trusty Giant Realistic Flying Tiger, but when he finds out she's gone, it sends UG on a journey to find the tiger and figure out why she left.

3.title: Space Emperor
3.plot: Space Emperor: Uncle Grandpa accidentally unleashes a floating Funny Face that's so funny you laugh yourself to insanity. / Funny Face: When Uncle Grandpa mistakes a kid in a costume for an evil space emperor, he sends him to another dimension.

4.title: Funny Face
4.plot: Uncle Dummy: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve try to convince Mr. Gus that his ventriloquist dummy is alive. / Face Fix: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve help Mr. Gus try to get his face back to normal before an important photo shoot.

5.title: Mustache Cream
5.plot: Moustache Cream: When Uncle Grandpa and the gang are in a rush to purchase some emergency moustache cream, they face a formidable foe: Mart Mart. / Nickname: When a kid wants a cool nickname, Uncle Grandpa tells him he has to earn it in the most legendary way ever: yard work!

6.title: Nickname
6.plot: When a kid wants a cool nickname, UG tells him he has to earn it in the most legendary way ever: yard work!

7.title: Driver's Test
7.plot: When a girl has trouble passing her driving test, Uncle Grandpa shows up to help her. But when they accidentally set a Crazy Baby loose in the city, it's up to Uncle Grandpa to stop it... by teaching the girl how to drive!

8.title: Uncle Grandpa Sitter
8.plot: Mr. Gus and Pizza Steve have plans to go out for the night, but Uncle Grandpa can't be left alone in the RV, so they need a babysitter. But when none are available, they turn to Uncle Grandpa to babysit himself.

9.title: Uncle Grandpa Ate My Homework!
9.plot: When Uncle Grandpa shows up and mistakenly eats a kid's Egyptian diorama for school, he helps the kid bring an actual pyramid to class, but accidentally unleashes an evil mummy on the world.

10.title: Uncle Grandpa for a Day
10.plot: When Uncle Grandpa gets his head stuck in a peanut butter jar, Mr. Gus and Pizza Steve have to pretend to be Uncle Grandpa and help a kid.

11.title: Afraid of the Dark
11.plot: When Uncle Grandpa helps a little girl who is afraid of the dark, he convinces her there's nothing to be afraid of but their imaginations. But when their imaginations prove to be pretty terrifying, they go on a quest to turn on the lights.

12.title: Treasure Map
12.plot: Uncle Grandpa and the gang don't have money to pay for their meal at a restaurant. But when they discover a treasure map, it could be the answer to all their problems. Too bad the treasure map is actually a restaurant activity place mat.

13.title: Locked Out
13.plot: Uncle Grandpa gets locked out of his RV and accidentally sets off the security system.

14.title: Jorts
14.plot: When Mr. Gus gets stuck in an embarrassingly super tight pair of jorts, he has to somehow get out of them in order to save his friends.

15.title: Brain Game
15.plot: Uncle Grandpa calls on Pizza Steve, the self-proclaimed master of video games, to help a kid beat a game. Only problem: Pizza Steve is terrible at video games.

16.title: Mystery Noise
16.plot: Mystery Noise: It's Sleepover Dream Night in the RV and the gang just wants to get some sleep to dream their dreams, but when a mysterious noise keeps them awake, their grip on sanity begins slipping.

17.title: Charlie Burgers
17.plot: Uncle Grandpa and crew help a friendly dog, Charlie Burgers, find his lost ball by literally turning the world upside down.

18.title: Uncle Grandpa Shorts
18.plot: A collection of shorts where Uncle Grandpa and the gang host a news program that goes awry, two turtles decide whether things are cool or dumb, and Uncle Grandpa goes on an accidental rampage trying to bust open a piñata.

19.title: Perfect Kid
19.plot: Uncle Grandpa helps a kid become perfect by turning him into a robot. But when the robot tries to destroy him for being imperfect, Uncle Grandpa goes on the run.

20.title: Big in Japan
20.plot: Uncle Grandpa and the gang travel to Japan to help a kid make his own giant monster movie.

21.title: Leg Wrestler
21.plot: When Uncle Grandpa and Mr. Gus argue over what show to watch on TV, Pizza Steve has the perfect way to solve their dilemma: Leg wrestling battle.

22.title: Future Pizza
22.plot: When Uncle Grandpa travels back through time with a warning that Pizza Steve will do something to offend him in the next five minutes, Pizza Steve begins to obsess over what he could possibly do to offend Uncle Grandpa.

23.title: More Uncle Grandpa Shorts
23.plot: Three cartoon shorts. Uncle Grandpa gives a hip hop style tour of the RV, Uncle Grandpa buys the latest issue of "Weird Man" and Pizza Steve fights a spaghetti and meatball monster in an Italian Karate arena showdown.

24.title: Viewer Special
24.plot: Kev wins the chance to draw a new episode of Uncle Grandpa.

25.title: Bad Morning
25.plot: When Uncle Grandpa has a bad morning, everybody has a bad morning.

26.title: Prank Wars
26.plot: When Pizza Steve and Mr. Gus engage in a prank war, Mr. Gus ends up pulling the biggest prank, only realizing too late that it will get Pizza Steve eaten.

27.title: 1992 Called
27.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve travel back in time to retrieve a pair of pants.

28.title: Bezt Friends
28.plot: Uncle Grandpa goes to extreme measures to surpass Pizza Steve as Pizza Steve's best friend.

29.title: Food Truck
29.plot: Greed causes Pizza Steve's latest business venture to backfire.

30.title: Hide and Seek
30.plot: A game of hide and seek uncovers a neglected remnant from Uncle Grandpa's past.

31.title: History of Wrestling
31.plot: A look back on The Nuttiest Match Ever, a historic wrestling event revolving around legends Chicken Man, The Best, and Mysterious Gus.

32.title: Sick Bag
32.plot: Uncle Grandpa journeys inside Belly Bag to cure his friend of a mysterious illness.

33.title: Vacation
33.plot: Uncle Grandpa goes on vacation only to discover that being Uncle Grandpa is a full time job.

34.title: Aunt Grandma
34.plot: The gang must stop a nefarious impostor from rendering Uncle Grandpa obsolete.

35.title: Grounded
35.plot: Uncle Grandpa must fix his mistake after he helps a grounded teen go to a party.

36.title: Haunted RV
36.plot: RV Olympics: Pizza Steve and Mr. Gus compete in the RV Olympics. / Uncle Melvins: Legendary rock band, the Melvins, team up with Uncle Grandpa to help a young girl who wants to win her school's talent show.

37.title: Internet Troll
37.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Mr. Gus venture through the World Wide Web to destroy an internet troll.

38.title: Not Funny
38.plot: Uncle Grandpa tries to make a girl named Jacqueline laugh at his jokes, but she doesn't think they're funny. When Uncle Grandpa sees what's going on in her body, he discovers a bunch of monsters that resulted from her laughing on the inside.

39.title: Prison Break
39.plot: When Pizza Steve and Mr. Gus accidentally place a prank call on an intergalactic phone, they immediately get thrown into intergalactic jail and must work together to escape.

40.title: Escalator
40.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve get stuck on a shopping mall escalator.

41.title: Christmas Special: Part 1
41.plot: Santa and Uncle Grandpa must work through their personal differences in order to save Christmas.

42.title: Christmas Special: Part 2
42.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

43.title: Dog Day
43.plot: When a father refuses his daughter's request for a dog, Uncle Grandpa vows to teach the girl responsibility - by becoming a dog.

44.title: Tiger and Mouse
44.plot: When Giant Realistic Flying Tiger chases a mouse around the RV, Uncle Grandpa forces them to be friends. But he has to cope with the fact that both animals are destroying the RV.

45.title: Pizza Steve's Diary
45.plot: Mr. Gus accidentally selects Pizza Steve's secret diary as his bath time reading material. Pizza Steve desperately tries to get the book back.

46.title: Ballin'
46.plot: Uncle Grandpa has to go to city court to pay for all of his parking violations, but when he crashes the RV into a basketball court, he is challenged by basketball players who want it.

47.title: Big Trouble for Tiny Miracle
47.plot: Tiny Miracle allows the gang to take advantage of his generosity at the expense of his own health.

48.title: New Kid
48.plot: Uncle Grandpa helps the new kid at school stand out on his first day, leading to (literally) hair-raising consequences.

49.title: Uncle Zombie
49.plot: Pizza Steve keeps Uncle Grandpa awake at night with terrifying consequences.

50.title: Uncle Caveman
50.plot: In this prehistoric-themed episode, Uncle Grandpa must save his new friend, Mr.Gus, from a hoard of hungry cavemen.

51.title: Misfortune Cookie
51.plot: After receiving an ominous fortune, Uncle Grandpa must snoop out whom among his friends is an enemy in disguise.

52.title: Wasteland
52.plot: After Uncle Grandpa neglects his garbage duties, he embarks on a quest to save his friends from the overflowing pile of trash.

1.title: Duck Lips
1.plot: After Uncle Grandpa molds her mouth into "duck lips," a young girl must face the consequences of her new found popularity.

2.title: Numbskull
2.plot: After a powerful blow to the head, Mr. Gus unwittingly becomes the funniest guy in the RV. A jealous Pizza Steve attempts to get the old Mr. Gus back by hitting him in the head with things.

3.title: Body Trouble
3.plot: Belly Bag decides to separate from Uncle Grandpa after a disagreement.

4.title: Shower Party
4.plot: Pizza Steve calls Andrew W.K. to help him throw an epic, ten minute party while Uncle Grandpa is in the shower.

5.title: Uncle Grandpa Land
5.plot: Pizza Steve must find a way to sneak onto his own roller coaster at the newly opened Uncle Grandpa Land.

6.title: Taco Comet
6.plot: Uncle Grandpa and the gang sneak into a secret military base to taste the most sought after treat in the cosmos: the Taco Comet.

7.title: The Fan
7.plot: Uncle Grandpa's number one fan gets more than he bargained for when Uncle Grandpa overstays his welcome.

8.title: The Package
8.plot: The gang gets nutty after repeatedly failing to open a mysterious package.

9.title: Are You Talking to Tree?
9.plot: The gang doesn't believe Uncle Grandpa when he claims the tree inside the RV is talking to him.

10.title: Older
10.plot: Uncle Grandpa turns a boy into a 300-year-old man, and must return him to normal.

11.title: Guest Directed Shorts
11.plot: A showcase of three Uncle Grandpa shorts presented in a three unique animation styles. From Pen Ward, Mike Wartella, Max Winston and Nick Cross.

12.title: Hundred Dollar Gus
12.plot: A showcase of three Uncle Grandpa shorts presented in a three unique animation styles. From Pen Ward, Mike Wartella, Max WInston and Nick Cross.

13.title: Weird Badge
13.plot: Uncle Grandpa teaches a young scout unconventional survival skills that eventually make her a hero.

14.title: The Great Spaghetti Western
14.plot: Uncle Grandpa sets out to save Mr. Gus' spaghetti restaurant from a dangerous outlaw named Pizza the Kid.

15.title: Pal.0
15.plot: When the RV's talking computer system malfunctions, Uncle Grandpa and the gang must figure out a way to stop the rogue computer and restore life in the RV back to normal. Special Guest: Weird Al Yankovic.

16.title: Uncle Grandpa at the Movies
16.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve annoy Mr.Gus during an afternoon at the movies.

17.title: Bottom Bag
17.plot: After receiving a new bag friend, Belly Bag has to realize its nefarious intentions to completely replace Belly Bag and stop it before it's too late.

18.title: Watermelon Gag
18.plot: When Uncle Grandpa gets a watermelon stuck in his mouth, he is unable to ask for help and people interpret it as a comedy routine. As Uncle Grandpa's popularity rises, his friendships and morale suffer.

19.title: Uncle Grandpa Babies
19.plot: When the President calls in the Uncle Grandpa babies, they have to act quickly and use their special baby powers to defuse a missile.

20.title: Birdman
20.plot: When Birdman makes the RV's attic his new home, Uncle Grandpa and the gang must figure out a way to make him leave before they're all driven crazy.

21.title: Uncle Grandpa Retires: Part 1
21.plot: Uncle Grandpa discovers a new, unusual occupation. (Part 1/2)

22.title: Uncle Grandpa Retires: Part 2
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Fool Moon
23.plot: Strange things start happening when Uncle Grandpa installs a moon roof in the RV.

24.title: Secret Santa
24.plot: When Uncle Grandpa and the crew all have the same popular and hard-to-find gift in mine for their Secret Santa, their nice Christmas shopping trip to the mall turns into a crazy competition.

25.title: Nacho Cheese
25.plot: Pizza Steve's father comes to visit the gang and almost immediately gets on their nerves with his over the top antics. Pizza Steve must get rid of his dad, and prove to himself that he doesn't need to live in his father's shadow any longer.

26.title: Mustache Tree
26.plot: When Uncle Grandpa runs out of mustaches, he travels to the mustache tree to stock up. But upon arrival, it seems a new clan of elves have become very territorial over the tree. Now Uncle Grandpa and the gang must fight in order to obtain a new 'stache.

1.title: The Little Mer-Tiger
1.plot: The origin of Tiger is told as a flashback. As the legend goes, Tiger used to be a mermaid. One day the evil ruler of the sea, Bubble Grandpa, demanded a hamburger and picked Tiger to retrieve it. He used his magic sea powers to give Tiger legs and send her ashore. But Tiger grew to love the land, and with the help of her new friend, Uncle Grandpa, defeated the evil sea ruler and kept her legs.

2.title: Ball Room
2.plot: Mr Gus fixes up the ballroom and warns Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve not to step a foot in there until he gets a chance to use it. But Uncle Grandpa mistakenly tosses a ball into the room. Now Pizza Steve and Uncle Grandpa have to retrieve the ball without touching one foot to the ground.

3.title: Back to the Library
3.plot: Uncle Grandpa uses time travel to convince his past self to return a library book on time.

4.title: Uncle Easter
4.plot: The Easter Bunny, unable to fulfill his egg-delivering duties, has Uncle Grandpa fill in for him.

5.title: King Gus
5.plot: When Mr Gus fulfills a timeless legend and is able to pull an immovable sword from a sandwich, he is deemed king of the food court! But the power quickly goes to his head, so Uncle Grandpa, Pizza Steve and Tiger must dethrone the royal monster they've created.

6.title: The Uncle Grandpa Movie: Part 1
6.plot: The gang attends the premiere of Majestico and Uncle Grandpa Boy, a movie about a little girl who wants to be a super hero.

7.title: The Uncle Grandpa Movie: Part 2
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Lamestation
8.plot: Pizza Steve gets the coolest new video game system in the world, but becomes quickly jealous of Mr Gus and his much more interesting game of jacks. Pizza Steve needs Uncle Grandpa's attention and will resort to anything to get it.

9.title: Space Oddity
9.plot: In the year 3021 on a distant planet, a tiny slimy alien Uncle Grandpa gets loose on the spaceship RV with the keys to the ignition. Now Mr Gus and Pizza Steve have to track down alien Uncle Grandpa, get the keys, and escape the alien planet before it explodes.

10.title: Relaxation Land
10.plot: Uncle Grandpa's relaxing weekend getaway quickly becomes a spooky nightmare for Pizza Steve.

11.title: The Land of the Lost Shadows
11.plot: A shadow demon steals pieces of Uncle Grandpa and the ganf's shadows and the friends discover they must go to the Land of Lost Shadows to get them back.

12.title: Pizza Eve
12.plot: Land of the Lost Shadows: When pieces of their shadows are stolen by a shadow demon, Uncle Grandpa and the gang must travel to the Land of Lost Shadows in order to retrieve them. / Pizza Eve: Uncle Grandpa falls for Pizza Steve's "girlfriend" and ends up in serious danger.

13.title: The Return of Aunt Grandma
13.plot: The Return of Aunt Grandma: Aunt Grandma is back and still bent on ruining Uncle Grandpa.

15.title: Messy Bessy
15.plot: Seth must clean his room and learn to be a neater person in order to keep Messy Bessy from making his life a nightmare.

16.title: Memory Foam
16.plot: Messy Bessy: Seth must clean his room and learn to be a neater person in order to keep Messy Bessy from making his life a nightmare. / Memory Foam: When a new mattress sucks away all of PS's memories, UG and the crew must find a ay to get them back.

17.title: Even More Shorts
17.plot: Weird Man apprehends a dangerous foreign criminal, Belly Bag discovers a cat stuck in the RV tree, and Uncle Grandpa hosts a space exploration program on this new collection of shorts.

18.title: Fleas Help Me
18.plot: Uncle Grandpa wants to help Charlie Burgers with his flea problem, but the darn things are just too small, so Uncle Grandpa enlarges Charlie Burgers and heads into his fur to take on the fleas head to head.

19.title: Wicked Shades
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Except for Cooper
20.plot: A young boy must learn to eat his spinach in order to save Uncle Grandpa and the others from a rowdy gang of evil vegetables.

21.title: In the Clouds
21.plot: In the Clouds: Uncle Grandpa helps a boy get his head out of the clouds and focused on his history test. / Jerky Jasper: Uncle Grandpa goes to great lengths to meet Pizza Steve's imaginary friend.

22.title: The Lepre Con
22.plot: On a St. Patrick's Day trip to Ireland, Uncle Grandpa and the gang cross paths with a sneaky leprechaun who tricks them into stealing gold. Once discovered they've been had, the gang execute a plan to return the stolen gold and make that leprechaun pay.

23.title: Fear of Flying
23.plot: Thiago has a crippling fear of flying, so Uncle Grandpa turns him into a fly to help get over it. But the young Argentinian is stubborn so it takes a near death experience to convince him that flying isn't too bad.

24.title: G'day Mornin
24.plot: Uncle Fashion: Uncle Grandpa helps a young boy who wants to be a fashion designer by taking him somewhere his style will be appreciated. / G'day Mornin': Uncle grandpa goes to Australia where he must stop an out-of-control collecting kangaroo before he destroys the Earth.

25.title: Uncle Fashion
25.plot: Uncle Grandpa helps a young boy who wants to be a fashion designer by taking him to another planet to design clothes for aliens. But Uncle Grandpa's plan backfires when the aliens develop a serious taste for their new clothes.

26.title: Inventor Mentor
26.plot: Uncle Grandpa helps a little girl in Italy who wants to be captain of the soccer team by making her a captain of his ship.

1.title: Jerky Jasper
1.plot: Uncle Grandpa goes to great lengths to meet Pizza Steve's imaginary friend.

2.title: Dinosaur Day
2.plot: Pizza Steve's jealousy ruins Uncle Grandpa's Dinosaur Day celebration for Mr Gus.

3.title: RV Olympics
3.plot: Pizza Steve and Mr. Gus compete in the RV Olympics.

4.title: Uncle Melvins
4.plot: Legendary rock band, the Melvins, team up with Uncle Grandpa to help a young girl who wants to win her school's talent show.

5.title: Uncle Baseball
5.plot: A failing little little league team that is ready to give up, gets help from Uncle Grandpa and Major League Baseball players.

6.title: Costume Crisis
6.plot: Uncle Baseball: A failing little league team on the brink of giving up gets help from Uncle Grandpa and some Major League Baseball players. / Costume Crisis: Uncle Grandpa makes improvements to a kid's Halloween costume.

7.title: Uncle Grandpa Runs for President
7.plot: Uncle Grandpa Runs for President: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve run against one another in the RV presidential race. / Chill Out: Uncle Grandpa takes a kid to the North Pole for an epic snowball battle.

8.title: Chill Out
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: The Bike Ride
9.plot: Two friends, Ewan Morgan and Nick Safir, go on a bike ride to Chicago, Illinois, to watch the Celtics play the Bulls in game 4 of the first round of the 2017 NBA finals.

10.title: Mr. Gus Moves Out
10.plot: The Bike Ride: Pizza Steve desperately tries to prevent the gang from finding out his shameful secret. / Mr. Gus Moves Out: When a fed-up Mr. Gus moves out of the RV, Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve work together to get him back.

11.title: Hiccup Havok
11.plot: Hiccup Havok: Uncle Grandpa helps a kid who can't get rid of the hiccups. / MacGuffin: Uncle Grandpa and a kid embark on a dangerous jungle adventure in search of a legendary MacGuffin.

13.title: Gone to His Head
13.plot: Gone to His Head: Uncle Grandpa's new found confidence makes his head big. / Pony Tale: Uncle Grandpa grows a ponytail, which gains him the attention of a magical pony.

14.title: Pony Tale
14.plot: Uncle Grandpa grows a ponytail, which gains him the attention of a magical pony.

15.title: You Can't Handle the Tooth
15.plot: You Can't Handle the Tooth: Uncle Grandpa and Mr. Gus must rescue Pizza Steve from the Tooth Fairy. / A Gift for Gus: Uncle Grandpa's present for Mr. Gus gets loose and causes trouble.

16.title: A Gift for Gus
16.plot: Uncle Grandpa's present for Mr. Gus gets loose and causes trouble.

17.title: Robo UG
17.plot: Uncle Grandpa builds a robot version of himself to help with his duties.

18.title: Lil Mac
18.plot: Robo-UG: Uncle Grandpa builds a robot version of himself to help with his duties. / Lil' Mac: Mr. Gus' nephew terrorizes Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve.

19.title: Disappearing Act
19.plot: Uncle Grandpa helps a young wannabe magician by teaching her a new trick.

20.title: Tongue Tied
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Uncle Dummy
21.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve try to convince Mr. Gus that his ventriloquist dummy is alive.

22.title: Face Fix
22.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Pizza Steve help Mr. Gus try to get his face back to normal before an important photo shoot.

23.title: The Phone Call
23.plot: The Phone Call: A threatening phone call from a stranger causes the gang to panic. / Uncle Cupid: Cupid, too lonely to perform his Valentine's Day duties, comes to Uncle Grandpa for help.

24.title: Uncle Cupid
24.plot: Cupid, too lonely to perform his Valentine's Day duties, comes to Uncle Grandpa for help.

25.title: Doctor Visit
25.plot: Uncle Grandpa hates going to the doctor, but he's overdue for an important vaccination.

26.title: The Cake Mistake
26.plot: Uncle Grandpa and Mr. Gus eat a cake meant for someone else.

imdb.title: Uncle Grandpa
plot: The misadventures of a magical uncle and grandpa to everyone in the world and his friends.::bhenry268
synopsis: A strange man who is the uncle and the grandfather of everybody in the world help kids out with their problems by taking them on reality-bending adventures.
